long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're a Blackboard user, you can relate to the frustration of constantly clicking back and forth between your courses, refreshing your page only to lose the page you were on, trying to move back and forth with unexpected behavior, and more.

Blackboard's user interface is very poorly tested, and brings with it many frustrating nuances that are difficult to tolerate.

BBDash aims to ease the pain of using Blackboard by acting as a portal to all of the different parts of Blackboard, all on one dashboard. With columns for grades, activity streams, and course pages, your bases are covered. These columns display nearly all content that Blackboard has, and each has complex filtering and sorting methods to get precisely the content you need.
